title: Note Fellows
details: My first project that I collaborated on. Myself and three others completed this simple note taking application in one week.

title: Vote Tracker
details: 'Vote for the place you would most like to visit!' This project involved generating a random number and using that number to pull from a collection of images. Some of my first css exposure.

title: Snookie's Cookies
details: Salmon cookies made with fish, salmon cookies are delish! A mock business which is my second project. It has an animated fish and a hilarious. Used plain JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

title: Guessing Game
details: My first project using JavaScript. No styling at all however it was a nice example of how to code without the crutch of online tutorials that supply the user with starter code.
